name: Get Up, François!
description:
Little François has fallen down and we need to help him get rid of that frown, help him get to the top by remembering to always GET UP!

The aim of the game is to platform your way out of the dark forest, Little François is in a tough spot in life so help him get back on top, but the main goal is to not give up and make it as far as you can!

Made as part of the global games jam!

Made by Team Pandacakes!

Credits:

Developer- Lucy Bradbury 

2D Artist- Charley Crisp 

Level Designer and UI Artist- Nancy Dor
